title: How to Delete a Happn Account

steps.title: Open Happn.
steps.content: Open Happn. This app icon looks like two white GPS markers next to each other on a blue background. You’ll find this on the home screen, in the app drawer, or by searching. Login if prompted.

steps.title: Tap your account avatar .
steps.content: Tap your account avatar . You’ll see this as the right-most icon in the bottom menu.

steps.title: Tap App Settings.
steps.content: Tap App Settings . You might have to scroll down to see this.

steps.title: Tap My data.
steps.content: Tap My data . This option is near the bottom of the menu, so you’ll need to scroll down.

steps.title: Tap Delete my account.
steps.content: Tap Delete my account . You’ll be prompted if you want to pause or delete your account. If you pause your account, it will disappear from the app, but you’ll be able to reactivate it. If you delete your account, it will be deleted from the app, and you won’t have the ability to reactivate it.

steps.title: Tap Delete my account.
steps.content: Tap Delete my account . You’ll then be prompted to give a reason for deleting the account. Pick a reason to continue.

steps.title: Tap Yes, I’m done!.
steps.content: Tap Yes, I’m done! . After you tap a reason, the “Yes, I’m done!” button will appear. You’ll get a confirmation pop up that lets you know your account has been deleted.
